TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileLogTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TraceListener

summary.span: 提供一个简单的侦听器，用于将日志记录输出指引至文件。

span.span: Provides a simple listener that directs logging output to file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了自动维护功能，可根据需要每天或按应用程序存档日志文件。The class provides automated maintenance capabilities to archive log files as needed, on a daily or per-application basis. 此自动存档功能有助于降低开发人员和管理员的维护责任。This automatic archival functionality helps reduce the maintenance responsibilities of developers and administrators. 的实例可以添加到 或 集合，以将输出从日志记录重定向到文本文件。An instance of can be added to the or collections to redirect output from logging to a text file. 此类的实例还可以添加到 Visual Basic 应用程序中 `My.Application.Log` 或 `My.Log` （适用于 Web 应用程序）。Instances of this class can also be added to `My.Application.Log` or `My.Log` (for Web applications) in Visual Basic applications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：更改 My. Log 写入信息的位置](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)`.`For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)`.` 此类的主要功能是：The main features of this class are: 1. *存档功能*。*Archival functionality*. 此类生成的日志文件根据基名称和日期命名，以及一个数字来区分日志文件与日志的后续版本。The log files generated by this class are named according to the base name and the date, along with a number to distinguish the log file from successive versions of the log. 根据需要创建新的日志文件。New log files are created on an as-needed basis. 文件名的显式形式是 `baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`version`] .log，其中：The explicit form of the file name is `baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`version`].log, where: - `baseName` 部分是由 属性指定的基本日志名称。The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the property. - `dateStamp` 部分的格式为 "YYYY-MM-DD"，当 或 时显示它。The `dateStamp` part has the format "YYYY-MM-DD", and it is shown when is or . - 如果需要多个具有相同 `baseName` 和 `dateStamp`的日志文件，则会在文件名中添加 `version` 部分 `Integer`。If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `version` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name. 2. *多个类实例*。*Multiple class instances*. 如果 类的实例写入正在使用的文件：If an instance of the class writes to a file that is in use: - 如果文件正由同一进程中的 类的另一个实例使用，则该类共享该文件。The class shares the file if it is being used by another instance of the class in the same process. - 类将使用下一个可用的名称创建新的日志文件（如果该文件正由另一个进程使用）。The class creates a new log file using the next available name if the file is being used by another process. 3. *线程安全性*。*Thread safety*. 类是线程安全的。The class is thread safe. 这使你可以从多个线程安全地将消息写入日志，而无需使用锁定。This allows you to safely write messages to the log from multiple threads without using locks. **日志文件位置****Log-File Location** - 属性采用 枚举来指定要将日志文件写入其中的一个典型目录。The property takes a enumeration to specify one of the typical directories to write the log file to. - 若要将日志写入到其他位置，请将 属性设置为该位置。To write the log to another location, set the property to that location. **日志文件名****Log-File Name** - 日志文件的基名称由 属性指定。The base name for the log file is specified by the property. - 可以从 属性读取当前日志文件的名称。The current log file name can be read from the property. 它派生自多个其他属性以及文件系统中日志的当前状态。It is derived from several other properties and the current state of the logs in the file system. **日志维护****Log Maintenance** - 创建新日志文件的最小频率由 属性决定。The minimum frequency for creating new log files is determined by the property. 当值为 或 时，将至少每天或每周创建一个新的日志文件，并将日期戳合并到 名称中。When the value is or , a new log file is created at least once every day or week, and a date stamp is incorporated into the name. - 日志文件的最大大小（以字节为单位）由 属性决定。The maximum size (in bytes) of the log file is determined by the property. 如果日志文件大小超过此大小，则会丢弃写入到日志中的其他消息，并根据 属性引发异常。If the log file size exceeds this size, additional messages written to the log are discarded and, depending on the property, an exception is thrown. - 属性确定必须有多少可用空间（以字节为单位）。The property determines how much free space (in bytes) must be available. 这有助于确保 类将不会使用所有可用的磁盘空间。This helps ensure that the class will not consume all available disk space. 如果可用空间小于 个字节，请使用 属性指定日志写入行为。Use the property to specify the behavior of log writes when there are less than bytes free. **日志文件输出设置****Log-File Output Settings** - 属性指定在每次写入日志文件后是否应自动刷新基础流。The property specifies whether the underlying stream should be flushed automatically after each write to the log file. - 属性指定是将消息追加到当前日志文件（如果允许），还是将其写入新的日志文件。The property specifies whether to append messages to the current log file, if allowed, or write them to a new log file. - 属性指定用于在日志消息中分隔字段的字符串。The property specifies the string to use for delimiting the fields within a log message. - 属性指定在创建新日志文件时使用的编码。The property specifies the encoding to use when creating a new log file. **日志文件输出****Log-File Output** - 和 方法将消息写入日志文件。The and methods write messages to the log file. 这些方法将检查 属性以及具有相同基名称的任何现有日志，以确定是否应创建新日志。These methods check the property, along with any existing logs with the same base name to determine if a new log should be created. - 方法将当前在输出缓冲区中的所有消息刷新到日志文件。The method flushes any messages currently in the output buffer to the log file. - 方法将关闭日志文件，以使其可供其他进程使用。The method closes the log file so that it can be used by other processes. **启用输出****Enabling Output** 您必须启用跟踪或调试才能使用跟踪侦听器。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a trace listener. 以下语法是编译器特定的。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用C#或 Visual Basic 以外的编译器，请参阅编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要在中C#启用调试，请在编译代码时将`/d:DEBUG`标志添加到编译器命令行，也可以将`#define DEBUG`添加到文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 `/d:DEBUG=True` 标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要启用跟踪C#，请在编译代码时将`/d:TRACE`标志添加到编译器命令行，或将`#define TRACE`添加到文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 `/d:TRACE=True` 标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要设置侦听器的级别，请编辑应用程序的配置文件。To set the level of your listener, edit the configuration file for your application. 在此文件中，您可以添加一个侦听器，设置其类型并设置其参数，删除侦听器，或者清除之前由应用程序设置的所有侦听器。Within this file, you can add a listener, set its type and set its parameters, remove a listener, or clear all the listeners previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应与下面的示例类似。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. 若要运行此示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/standard/assembly/names.md). ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将 类的实例名称设置为 Microsoft.visualbasic.logging.filelogtracelistener。This method sets the instance name of the class to FileLogTraceListener. 可以通过 属性访问实例名称。You can access the instance name through the property.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the supplied name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将 类的实例名称设置为 `name`。This method sets the instance name of the class to `name`. 可以通过 属性访问实例名称。You can access the instance name thought the property.

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Append { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Append : bool with get, set

summary.span: 确定是将输出追加到当前文件还是将输出写入新文件或现有文件。

span.span: Determines whether to append the output to the current file or write it to a new or existing file.

value.span: ， 指示将输出追加到当前文件， 指示将输出写入新文件。

span.span: , with indicating that the output is appended to the current file, and indicating that output is written to a new file.
The default setting for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `True` 属性时，日志文件将以 模式打开，以保留现有日志。When the property is `True`, the log file is opened in mode, to keep existing logs. 当前写入位置从文件末尾开始，以便将所有新日志追加到文件末尾。The current writing position starts at the end of the file, so that any new logs are appended to the end of the file. 当 `False``Append` 属性时，日志文件将以 模式打开，在此模式下，将在打开日志文件时删除所有日志数据。When the `Append` property is `False`, the log file is opened in mode, where all log data is deleted when the log file is opened. `FileLogTraceListener` 在 `Append` "" 设置为 "`False`" 后删除日志文件的现有内容，或者在写入第一个日志之前删除文件。The `FileLogTraceListener` deletes existing contents of the log file once after the `Append` propery is set to `False` or the file is opened and before it writes the first log. 之后 `FileLogTraceListener` 将附加跟踪数据追加到文件末尾。After that, `FileLogTraceListener` appends additional trace data to the end of the file. 如果 `FileLogTraceListener` 实例关闭后重新打开，而 Append 设置为 False，则会在写入其他日志之前删除日志文件数据。If the `FileLogTraceListener` instance is closed and then reopened while Append is set to False, it erases the log file data before writing additional logs. 这可能导致丢失数据，尤其是在将 `Append` 属性的值设置为配置文件中 `False` 的情况下。This can lead to missing data, particularly if you set the value of the `Append` property to `False` in a configuration file. 在以下情况下，会重写此行为：This behavior is overridden in the following scenarios: - 输出文件被另一个进程锁定。The output file is locked by another process. 将创建一个新的日志文件，其中包含一个包含在 名称中的版本号。A new log file is created with a version number that is incorporated into the name. - 当前文件的大小大于 属性允许的大小。The current file size is greater than what the property allows. 其他消息将被丢弃。Additional messages are discarded. 根据 属性，将引发异常。Depending on the property, an exception is thrown. - 根据 属性指定的日志创建计划，现有文件名已过期。The existing file name is out of date according to the log-creation schedule specified by the property. 创建新的日志文件。A new log file is created. 日期戳将合并到 名称中。The date stamp is incorporated into the name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoFlush { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoFlush : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示写入日志文件流时是否刷新缓冲区。

span.span: Indicates whether or not the writing to the log file stream flushes the buffer.

value.span: ， 指示每次写入之后都刷新日志文件流；否则将缓存日志条目，这样写入会更有效率。

span.span: , with indicating that the stream is flushed after every write; otherwise the log entries are buffered and written more efficiently.
The default setting for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的 `False` 设置为大多数应用程序提供最佳性能，因为一次将多个消息写入日志文件会更有效。The `False` setting for the property provides the best performance for most applications, because it is more efficient to write multiple messages to the log file at one time. 您可以使用 方法来刷新日志文件的输出缓冲区中的当前任何消息。You can use the method to flush any messages currently in the log file's output buffer. 你还可以使用 方法，该方法在关闭日志文件之前隐式刷新流。You can also use the method, which implicitly flushes the stream before closing the log file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BaseFileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BaseFileName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置日志文件的基名称，该名称用于创建日志文件的完整名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the base name for the log files, which is used to create the full log-file name.
The base name for the log files.

value.span: 默认为应用程序的产品名称。

span.span: The default is the application's product name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定 类写入的日志文件的基名称。The property determines the base name for the log files that the class writes to. 属性提供当前日志文件的完整名称。The property gives the current full log-file name. 它是根据日志路径、基名称、日期和数字生成的，以将其与不同的日志版本区分开来。It is generated according to the log path, the base name, the date, and a number to distinguish it from different versions of the log. 根据需要创建新的日志文件。New log files are created on an as-needed basis. 完整日志文件名的显式形式是 `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`iteration`] .log，其中The explicit form of the full log file name is `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`iteration`].log, where - `path` 部分由 属性确定，如果该属性值设置为 ，则为 属性。The `path` part is determined by the property and, if that property value is set to , the property. - `baseName` 部分是由 属性指定的基本日志名称。The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the property. - `dateStamp` 部分的格式为 "YYYY-MM-DD"，当 设置为 或 时，将显示该格式。The `dateStamp` part has the format "YYYY-MM-DD", and it is shown when is set to or . - 如果需要多个具有相同 `baseName` 和 `dateStamp`的日志文件，则会在文件名中添加 `iteration` 部分 `Integer`。If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `iteration` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name.

summary.span: 关闭当前日志文件的基础流，并释放与当前流关联的所有资源。

span.span: Closes the underlying stream for the current log file and releases any resources associated with the current stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要显式调用 方法，因为 类管理基础流。You do not need to call the method explicitly, because the class manages the underlying steam.

summary.span: 当 属性设置为 时获取或设置日志文件目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the log file directory when the property is set to .
, which is the name of the log-file directory.

value.span: 此属性的默认设置是用户的应用程序数据目录。

span.span: The default setting for this property is the user's directory for application data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性时，它还会将 属性设置为 。When the property is set, it also sets the property to . 如果无法解析该目录，则 属性将引发异常。The property will throw an exception if the directory cannot be resolved.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在日志消息中分隔字段的分隔符。

span.span: Gets or sets the delimiter used to delimit fields within a log message.

value.span: ，用作日志消息中字段的分隔符。

span.span: , which is the delimiter used for fields within a log message.

value.span: 此属性的默认设置为制表符字符。

span.span: The default setting for this property is the TAB character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您更改默认分隔符。The property allows you to change the default delimiter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::DiskSpaceExhaustedOption DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::DiskSpaceExhaustedOption get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::DiskSpaceExhaustedOption value); };

summary.span: 确定在写入日志文件时，如果可用磁盘空间小于 属性所指定的磁盘空间时应采取的操作。

span.span: Determines what to do when writing to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the property.

value.span: 确定在尝试写入日志文件时，如果可用磁盘空间小于 属性所指定的磁盘空间，或日志文件大小大于 属性所允许的大小，应采取的操作。

span.span: Determines what to do when attempting to write to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the property, or if the log file size is greater than what the property allows.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 时，如果没有足够的保留磁盘空间，则会以静默方式丢弃日志消息。When the property is set to , the log messages are silently discarded if there is not enough reserved disk space. 这是默认行为，它会阻止简单应用程序在磁盘太满时失败。This is the default behavior, and it prevents simple applications from failing if the disk gets too full. 更可靠的应用程序可以将 属性设置为 ，并在写入日志的所有代码的周围添加 `Try...Catch` 块。More robust applications can set the property to , and add `Try...Catch` blocks around all code that writes to the log.

param.span: 若为 ，释放托管资源和非托管资源；若为 ，则只释放非托管资源。

summary.span: 关闭基础流，并可以选择释放托管资源。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `disposing` 参数为 `True` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `True`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 此方法调用基类的 方法，。

span.span: This method calls the method of the base class, .

, which is the current full log-file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供当前日志文件的完整名称。The property gives the current full log-file name. 它是根据日志路径、基名称、日期和数字生成的，以将其与不同的日志版本区分开来。It is generated according to the log path, the base name, the date, and a number to distinguish it from different versions of the log. 根据需要创建新的日志文件。New log files are created on an as-needed basis. 完整日志文件名的显式形式是 `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`iteration`] .log，其中：The explicit form of the full log-file name is `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`iteration`].log, where: - `path` 部分由 属性确定，如果该属性值设置为 ，则为 属性。The `path` part is determined by the property and, if that property value is set to , the property. - `baseName` 部分是由 属性指定的基本日志名称。The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the property. - `dateStamp` 部分的格式为 YYYY-MM-DD，在 或 时显示该部分。The `dateStamp` part has the format YYYY-MM-DD, and it is shown when is or . - 如果需要多个具有相同 `baseName` 和 `dateStamp`的日志文件，则会在文件名中添加 `iteration` 部分 `Integer`。If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `iteration` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyvirtual instance string[] GetSupportedAttributes() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetSupportedAttributes () As String()
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance string[] GetSupportedAttributes() cil managed

summary.span: 获取跟踪侦听器支持的自定义 XML 配置特性。

span.span: Gets the custom XML configuration attributes supported by the trace listener.

returns.span: 数组，包含此侦听器识别的 XML 配置特性。

span.span: array containing the XML configuration attributes recognized by this listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可在 XML 配置文件中使用 的自定义属性，以控制 类的实例的行为。The custom attributes for the can be used in the XML configuration file for controlling the behavior of an instance of the class. 使用任何其他特性会导致配置异常。Using any other attribute causes a configuration exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeHostName { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IncludeHostName : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示输出中是否应包括日志记录计算机的主机名。

span.span: Indicates whether or not the host name of the logging machine should be included in the output.

value.span: 如果应包括主机标识符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: Use if the host identifier should be included; otherwise use .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可配置 和 方法的行为。Use the property to configure the behavior of the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileLocation Location { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileLocation get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileLocation value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置日志文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets location for the log files.
, which is the location for the log file.
The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 属性将日志路径设置为预定义的路径之一，由 枚举值确定。Use the property to set the log path to one of the predefined paths, determined by the enumeration values. |**位置值****Location value**|**路径****Path**| |------------------------|--------------| ||所有用户共享的应用程序数据的路径，格式为：The path for the application data that is shared among all users, with the format:

`BasePath`\\`CompanyName`\\`ProductName`\\`ProductVersion`

`BasePath` 的典型值为：A typical value for `BasePath` is:

C:\documents and 和 Settings\All Users\Application 数据C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data

`CompanyName`、`ProductName`和 `ProductVersion` 的值来自程序集。The values of `CompanyName`, `ProductName`, and `ProductVersion` come from the assembly.| ||启动了应用程序的可执行文件的路径。The path for the executable file that started the application.| ||用户的应用程序数据的路径，格式为：The path for the application data of a user, with the format:

`BasePath`\\`CompanyName`\\`ProductName`\\`ProductVersion`

`BasePath` 的典型值为：A typical value for `BasePath` is:

C:\Documents and Settings\\`username`\Application DataC:\Documents and Settings\\`username`\Application Data

`CompanyName`、`ProductName`和 `ProductVersion` 的值构成了程序集。The values of `CompanyName`, `ProductName`, and `ProductVersion` come form the assembly.| ||当前系统的临时文件夹的路径。The path of the current system's temporary folder.| ||如果 指定的字符串不为空，则将其用作路径;否则，请使用用户的应用程序数据的路径。If the string specified by is not empty, then use it as the path; otherwise use the path for the application data of a user.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileCreationScheduleOption LogFileCreationSchedule { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileCreationScheduleOption get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileCreationScheduleOption value); };

summary.span: 确定要包括在日志文件名称中的日期。

span.span: Determines which date to include in the names of the log files.

value.span: 此项指示要包括在日志文件名称中的日期。

span.span: This indicates which date to include in the log-file names.
The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 将其中一个 枚举值分配给 属性，以指定要包含在日志文件名称中的日期。Assign one of the enumeration values to the property to specify which date to include in the names of the log files. 日期的格式为 YYYY-MM-DD。The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD. 有关日志文件名格式的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on the format of the log file name, see . |**LogFileCreationSchedule 值****LogFileCreationSchedule value**|**日志文件名称中的日期****Date in the log file name**| |---------------------------------------|-----------------------------------| ||将当前日期包括在日志文件名称中。Include the current date in the log file name.| ||不要将日期包括在日志文件名称中。Do not include the date in the log file name.| ||将当前周的第一天包括在日志文件名称中。Include the first day of the current week in the log file name.

周从星期六开始。The week starts on Saturday.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxFileSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxFileSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置所允许的日志文件的最大大小，以字节为单位。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowed size of the log file, in bytes.

value.span: 这是允许的日志文件的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: This is the maximum allowed log-file size, in bytes.
The default value is 5000000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可确保日志文件不会增长得太大。Use this property to make sure that the log files do not grow too large. 如果日志文件大小（以字节为单位）大于此属性的值，则当 类尝试将消息写入日志时，消息将被丢弃，失败或引发异常的原因取决于 属性的值。也.If the log file size (in bytes) is greater than the value of this property, then when the class attempts to write a message to the log, the message is discarded and the failure is either silent or an exception is thrown depending on the value of the property. 否则，如果可用磁盘空间量（以字节为单位）小于 ，则将消息写入日志。Otherwise, the message is written to the log, if the amount of free disk space (in bytes) is less than .

exception.span: 当此属性被设置为一个小于 1000 的值时。

span.span: When this property is set to a value less than 1000.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long ReserveDiskSpace { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.ReserveDiskSpace : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在将消息写入日志文件之前需要满足的可用磁盘空间量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of free disk space, in bytes, necessary before messages can be written to the log file.

value.span: 这是所需的可用磁盘空间量。

span.span: This is the amount of free disk space necessary.
The default value is 10000000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可确保日志文件不会完全填满磁盘空间。Use this property to make sure that the log files do not completely fill the disk. 如果可用磁盘空间量（以字节为单位）小于此属性的值，则当 类尝试将消息写入日志时，消息将被丢弃，失败或引发异常取决于 @no__t 的值_1_ 属性。If the amount of free disk space (in bytes) is less than the value of this property, then when the class attempts to write a message to the log, the message is discarded and the failure is either silent or an exception is thrown depending on the value of the property. 否则，如果日志文件大小（以字节为单位）大于 ，则将消息写入日志。Otherwise, the message is written to the log, if the log file size (in bytes) is greater than .

exception.span: 当此属性被设置为小于 0 的值时。

span.span: When this property is set to a value less than 0.

summary.span: 向输出文件写入跟踪数据。

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应由应用程序代码调用 方法。 methods are not intended to be called by application code. 这些方法由 、和 类的成员调用，以将跟踪数据写入输出。These methods are called by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法：This method: 1. 设置输出的数据和上下文信息的格式。Formats the data and context information for output. 2. 如有必要，创建新的日志文件。Creates a new log file, if necessary. 3. 将信息写入日志文件。Writes the information to the log file. 有关创建新日志文件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on creating new log files, see . 下表按显示的顺序列出了输出字段。The following table lists the output fields in the order they appear. 这些字段由 属性指定的字符串分隔，后跟行结束符。The fields are delimited by the string that the property specifies, and are followed by a line terminator. |**字段****Field**|**输出条件****Output condition**|**说明****Description**| |---------------|--------------------------|---------------------| |`source`|AlwaysAlways|`name` 的值。The value of `name`.| |`severity`|AlwaysAlways|`eventType`的枚举值名称。The enumeration-value name of `eventType`.| |`id`|AlwaysAlways|`id` 的字符串表示形式。The string representation of `id`.| |`message`|AlwaysAlways|`data` 的字符串表示形式。The string representation of `data`.| |`callStack`|当 标志设置在 属性中时。When the flag is set in the property.|`eventCache`的 属性。The property of `eventCache`.| |`CorrelationID`|当 标志设置在 属性中时。When the flag is set in the property.|`eventCache`的 属性。The property of `eventCache`.| |`DateTime`|当 标志设置在 属性中时。When the flag is set in the property.|`eventCache`的 属性的字符串表示形式。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 固定区域性用于字符串转换。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ProcessID`|当 标志设置在 属性中时。When the flag is set in the property.|`eventCache`的 属性的字符串表示形式。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 固定区域性用于字符串转换。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ThreadID`|当 标志设置在 属性中时。When the flag is set in the property.|`eventCache`的 属性。The property of `eventCache`.| |`Timestamp`|当 标志设置在 属性中时。When the flag is set in the property.|`eventCache`的 属性的字符串表示形式。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 固定区域性用于字符串转换。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`HostName`|当 `True` 属性时。When the property is `True`.|计算机的名称。The name of the computer.|

flag is set in the property.|`eventCache`的 属性。The property of `eventCache`.| |`Timestamp`|当 标志设置在 属性中时。When the flag is set in the property.|`eventCache`的 属性的字符串表示形式。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 固定区域性用于字符串转换。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`HostName`|当 `True` 属性时。When the property is `True`.|计算机的名称。The name of the computer.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(string message) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Write (message As String)

span.span: The custom message to write.

summary.span: 将消息逐字写入磁盘，不带任何附加上下文信息。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message to disk, without any additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将特定消息写入日志文件，而不包含任何其他上下文信息。The method writes a specific message to the log file, without any additional context information. 使用 方法之一在日志输出中包含上下文信息。Use the one of the methods to include the context information in the log output.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteLine(string message) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteLine (message As String)

span.span: The custom message to write.

summary.span: 将消息逐字写入磁盘，后跟当前行分隔符，不带任何附加上下文信息。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message to disk, followed by the current line terminator, without any additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将特定消息写入日志文件，而不包含任何其他上下文信息。The method writes a specific message to the log file, without any additional context information. 使用 方法之一在日志输出中包含上下文信息。Use the one of the methods to include the context information in the log output.
